concept.title: SDC Record Data Format
concept.shortdesc: SDC Record is a data format used by the to generate error record files for the pipeline. The can also use the SDC Record format to generate output files.

conbody.p: SDC Recordsdata formatData Collectordata formatUse the SDC Record format to process files produced by another pipeline, or to produce files that you might pass to another pipeline.
The SDC Record Files destination writes all records using the SDC Record format. You can also use Hadoop FS and the Kafka Producer to write files that use the SDC Record format.
You can use the Directory or Kafka Consumer origins to read SDC Record files.
